Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Olissippo Marques de Sa places you in the heart of Lisbon, walking distance from Center for Modern Art and Gulbenkian Museum. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of El Corte Ingles Shopping Center and Hospital Curry Cabral.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 164 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, a business center, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Planning an event in Lisbon? This hotel has 5382 square feet (500 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

A stay at Olissippo Marques de Sa places you in the heart of Lisbon, walking distance from Center for Modern Art and Gulbenkian Museum. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of El Corte Ingles Shopping Center and Hospital Curry Cabral.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Center for Modern Art - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Gulbenkian Museum - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
El Corte Ingles Shopping Center - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Hospital Curry Cabral - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Dolce Vita Shopping Monumental Mall - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Dr. Anastacio Goncalves Museum - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Saldanha Square - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Atrium Saldanha - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Campo Pequeno Bullring - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Culturgest - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Instituto Superior Tecnico - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Edward VII Park - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Marques de Pombal Square - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Hospital Dona Estefania - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Maria Matos Municipal Theater - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi

The preferred airport for Olissippo Marques de Sa is Lisbon (LIS-Portela) - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Olissippo Marques de Sa is Lisbon (LIS-Portela) - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi.

Room 1

Notice
* : TOURISTIC CITY TAX: A tax of 2,00 € per night/person (guests over 12 years), up to a maximum of 14,00 € per person, will be charged directly by hotel


From 01st January 2019, the City tax of Lisbon becomes 2€ per overnight stay and per person, up to a maximum total value of 14€ (Seven straight nights per overnight stay/person). Please note that the municipal fee it's NOT included in the room rate and it has to be paid by the guest at the check-out. Kids under 13 years are exempted.

Notice
* : TOURISTIC CITY TAX: A tax of 2,00 € per night/person (guests over 12 years), up to a maximum of 14,00 € per person, will be charged directly by hotel


From 01st January 2019, the City tax of Lisbon becomes 2€ per overnight stay and per person, up to a maximum total value of 14€ (Seven straight nights per overnight stay/person). Please note that the municipal fee it's NOT included in the room rate and it has to be paid by the guest at the check-out. Kids under 13 years are exempted.

Essential Information: Room 1

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Hotel Tariff Notes: Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding, no separate bed for children is provided unless otherwise stated. Extra Bed on Request. Baby Cot upon availability. Since the beginning of January 2016, a City Tax is being charged. The City Tax is collected at reception desk. Persons staying at the Hotel from 13 years old and over are entitled to pay 1 Euro, per person, per night until a maximum of 7 Euros per person, per continuous stay. Starting in January 2019 this Tax will be 2 Euros, same calculation as before, but the maximum will be 14 Euros per person.
